name: Time Convergence Terran [Campaign]
description:
The terran part of Time Convergence where Artanis will have to learn about the race he considers inferior.



## How To play:

- ## Download the ZIP

- ## Empty the Zip contents in the Time Convergence Folder






Mod



- Download TCTerran and put it in Mod folder.
- Download "WoD - Wolf" by Taylor Mouse at [https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/taylor-mouses-stuff/files/813634](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/taylor-mouses-stuff/files/813634>) ans put it in mod folder. 



---

3D Models an Assets



- [SheeldWall](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/SheeldWall>) Galahad 
- [TaylorMouse](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/TaylorMouse>) Tyr
- [Hammer107](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/Hammer107>) Ice Hammer, Anna Hart
- [GhostNova91](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/GhostNova91>) Furia, Pengawal
- [Thrikodias](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/Thrikodias>) Mama P, Highlander
- [Alleyvipersc2](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/Alleyvipersc2>) Grey Wolf, Da'mian, Avatar of storms, Sand Runner
